output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, the post contains "CMF 11240017" which indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" multiple times 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement with large reach (125,000-150,000 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, promotes Marcel Ciolacu's economic vision and PSD's platform 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly promotional content, not journalism 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication (PSD Brașov)
The post promotes both parliamentary and presidential aspects, mentioning Marcel Ciolacu both as prime minister and as a leader. Given that the presidential campaign period has ended, and this ad is still running, promoting a presidential candidate after the campaign period has ended, this constitutes a violation.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes Marcel Ciolacu - Has significant paid reach - Contains clear electoral messaging - Promotes party platform and candidate - Is paid party communication
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Brașov, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea electorală a candidatului prezidențial Ion-Marcel Ciolacu după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală, prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID: 1507022259999923) care promovează direct candidatul și viziunea sa, având un impact semnificativ (125.000-150.000 impresii). Postarea, activă după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, reprezintă o continuare a propagandei electorale după încheierea acesteia, cu un efect electoral direct în favoarea candidatului. Materialul conține număr CMF (11240017) și este finanțat de organizația politică, demonstrând natura sa de propagandă electorală.
